question.text:
Match the following.
 
  Column I   Column II
a Rheumatoid arthritis (i) Rapid spasm in muscle due to low Ca+2 in body fluid
(b) Tetany (ii) Degeneration of skeletal muscle mostly due to a genetic disorder
c Muscular dystrophy (iii) Autoimmune disorder affecting synovial membrane
(d) Poliomyelitis (iv) A viral disease that weakens muscles

options.text: <math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>-</mo><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

solution.text: Rheumatoid arthritis is an autoimmune disorder that involves the inflammation of almost all the joints of the body. Tetany is caused due to severe muscular contractions when there is hypocalcemia in the body. Muscular dystrophy is a genetic disorder of skeletal muscles and poliomyelitis is caused due to poliovirus and can lead to paralysis of the muscles.
